categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars: The Old Republic
Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Darth Vexus was a Sith Lord who served the Sith Empire during the Cold War. He was on Voss to hunt a group of dissident Jedi but was defeated by Darth Nox.

Darth Vexus was originally slated to appear in the mission "Allies" for the Sith Inquisitor class in Star Wars: The Old Republic, but the Voss-bound version of the mission was ultimately cut from the game and replaced with a simple conversation with Ashara Zavros.
